description: 学习名词单复数的特殊情况：单复数同形、只有复数形式、只有单数形式

basic_rules: 单复数同形：sheep → sheep, deer → deer, fish → fish
只有复数形式：clothes, pants, glasses, scissors
只有单数形式：news, information, advice, furniture
这些特殊情况需要特别记忆
memory_tips: 单复数同形：动物类较多
只有复数：成对出现的东西
只有单数：抽象概念或不可数名词
common_errors: I see many sheeps. (错误) → I see many sheep. (正确)
The clothe is clean. (错误) → The clothes are clean. (正确)
I have many news. (错误) → I have much news. (正确)

sentences: I see one sheep. → I see many sheep.
The clothes are clean. (只有复数)
The news is good. (只有单数)
I have one fish. → I have many fish.

templates.question: I see two _____ in the field.
I see many _____ in the river.
将下列单词分类：sheep, clothes, news, deer, pants, information
templates.answer: 单复数同形：sheep, deer；只有复数：clothes, pants；只有单数：news, information
templates.explanation: 根据名词的特殊情况分类

learning_objectives: 掌握名词单复数的特殊情况
能够正确使用单复数同形、只有复数、只有单数的名词
了解特殊情况需要特别记忆
